casebody.data:
Dwain Cornelius FERRELL
v.
Brad PERRITT, Administrator. No. 407P14-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 13, 2015. Dwain Cornelius Ferrell, for Ferrell, Dwain Cornelius. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the application filed by Defendant on the 9th of July 2015 in this matter for Writ of Habeas Corpus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Wake County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of July 2015."
